original_text: Now the rest of the deeds of Menahem and all that he did, are they not written in the Book of the Chronicles of the Kings of Israel?
korean_text: 므나헴의 남은 사적과 그가 행한 모든 일은 이스라엘 왕 역대지략에 기록되지 아니하였느냐

sentences.original_text: Now the rest of the deeds of Menahem
are they not written in the Book of the Chronicles of the Kings of Israel?
